description: In a scene from “Forever,” her solo show at New York Theater Workshop, Ms. Orlandersmith talks about visiting the Père Lachaise cemetery in Paris and finding inspiration in the Doors.
title: In Performance | Dael Orlandersmith
title_page: In Performance | Dael Orlandersmith - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Stripped of costumes and props, today’s best-known artists from the Broadway stage and Carnegie Hall offer intimate and thrilling performances for the camera.
